media_tile_copy.text: Logitech G engineers worked through a complete end-to-end technology optimization from sensor to firmware, circuitry to antenna design. We tested and refined each component, focusing on the slowest link until nothing was slow.

Logitech G engineers worked through a complete end-to-end technology optimization from sensor to firmware, circuitry to antenna design. We tested and refined each component, focusing on the slowest link until nothing was slow.

Recharging never interrupts the game

The game doesn’t need to stop when it’s time to recharge. G700s charges during play over its standard Micro-USB cable. To power up, switch seamlessly from wireless to data-over-cable connection over a standard Micro-USB cable. The standard AA NiMH batteries charge up while you stay in the game.

media_tile_copy_copy.text:
At your command

Achieve great results with the default configuration straight out of the box. Or, set up one-button triggers for actions that typically require digging into menus. Put push-to-talk communications in easier reach. Temporarily down-shift DPI for sniping. Reassign any game command or multi-command macro to any one of 13 programmable buttons with optional Logitech Gaming Software (LGS)Some profile settings require Logitech® Gaming Software, available at gaming.logitech.com/software..

media_tile_copy_copy_709457763.featureTitle: Consistent report rate, wired or wireless
media_tile_copy_copy_709457763.text:
Thought and action unite

Be confident that your every command is executed as quickly as possible. G700s maintains a consistent 1 ms report rate, whether over 2.4 GHz wireless or connected by USB. Up to eight times faster than a standard USB mouse, G700s captures your moves as fast as you can make them.

media_tile_copy_copy_497365844.text:
Be ready in an instant

Make the right moves in any game situation. Shift through up to 10 DPI settings, from pixel-precise targeting (200 DPI) to lightning-fast maneuvers (up to 8200 DPI) with a single button press, conveniently located behind the scroll wheel.

media_tile_copy_copy_80190760.text:
Precision and speed—without compromise

Unlike most mouse scroll wheels, G700s features hyper-fast, dual-mode scrolling. When gaming, quickly and accurately select menu options with click-to-click precision. Or, zip through Web pages with a quick flick of the free-spinning hyper-fast scroll wheel.

media_tile_copy_copy_1897714101.text:
Tiny anchor, strong connection

Ready for any laptop or LAN party, G700s includes a tiny receiver that can stay plugged in a USB port without getting in the way. Or store it away in the battery compartment when it’s not needed.

media_tile_copy_copy_1077887161.text:
Goes the distance, and then some

Gaming conditions torture typical mice. G700s is designed to endure. Upgraded primary mechanical microswitches are rated to a 20 million-click lifespan. Low-friction polytetrafluoroethylene feet are tested to last an amazing 250 km. Whatever you can dish out, G700s will stand up to it.

media_tile_copy_copy_1206901591.text:
A material advantage

Low-friction polytetrafluoroethylene feet reduce drag for faster motions, smoother cursor movements, and improved accuracy.

media_tile_copy_copy_318156019.text:
Natural curves mean comfortable control

 

With a naturally shaped grip designed for maximum comfort over hours of use, you’ll always be the last gamer standing. The individually sculpted buttons are easily identifiable by touch, ready when you need them, and unobtrusive when you don’t.

media_tile_copy_copy_1684165850.text:
A difference you can feel

We used infrared imaging to determine strategic tactile zones where the hand meets the mouse surface. We applied advanced materials to each zone for improved comfort and durability. The hydrophobic coating on the palm area helps prevent your hand from sticking. For heavy contact zones, we added a fingerprint-resistant coating to the primary buttons. And, dry grip on the sides ensures a steady hand.

media_tile_copy_copy_692308970.text:
Focus on accuracy

When the difference between MVP and also-ran is measured in pixels, laser sharp sensitivity pays off. G700s uses a gaming-grade laser that delivers precision at any hand speed and works across a wide range of surfaces to register even the most subtle of hand movements.

media_tile_copy_copy_1747901799.text:
A mouse with a memory

Every game requires its own unique setup, be it World of Tanks or League of Legends. Program all 13 buttons Some profile settings require Logitech® Gaming Software, available at gaming.logitech.com/software across 3 profiles for individual players or games and you can bring your setup to other PCs. Configure your mouse once. It remembers.

media_tile_copy_copy_1640763256.text:
Knowledge is power

Keep an eye on your DPI sensitivity and battery power that stays in view underneath your hand.

media_tile_copy_copy_177680953.text:
Make it yours–simply

Use the optional Logitech Gaming Software (LGS) to perfectly match its commands to your favorite games. Simple drag-and-drop settings allow you to customize button and tracking profiles for any game you play. Or, use pre-configured customizations with automatic game detection.Some profile settings require Logitech Gaming Software.

_x0033_.text: Internet connection for optional software downloadSome profile settings require Logitech® Gaming Software, available at gaming.logitech.com/software.
Max. accelerationTested on popular gaming mousepad surfaces.: 30 G

_x0034_.text: Max. speedTested on popular gaming mousepad surfaces.: up to 4.19 m (165 in)/second

_x0032_.text: USB report rate: Up to 1000 reports/second

_x0031_.text: Dynamic coefficient of frictionTested on wood-veneer desktop.: .09 μ (k)

_x0032_.text: Static coefficient of frictionTested on wood-veneer desktop.: .14 μ (s)
